required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Associations of the Grades of Doctor and Neonatal Outcomes
clinical_study.official_title: Associations of the Grades of Doctor and Neonatal Outcomes: An Observational Prospective Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Daping Hospital and the Research Institute of Surgery of the Third Military Medical University

clinical_study.source: Daping Hospital and the Research Institute of Surgery of the Third Military Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: In China, the standardized training system for residents was built last year, and the associations of the grades of doctors and accoucheurs and neonatal outcomes remains unclear.

detailed_description.textblock: In China, the grades of doctors and accoucheurs are divided into four levels, and different levels may induce differences of neonatal asphyxia and death. The standardized training system for residents was built last year,the associations of the grades of doctors and accoucheurs and neonatal asphyxia,neonatal death before and after the training systems need to be assess.

primary_outcome.description: neonatal asphyxia was defined according to manual of neonatal care

secondary_outcome.description: to assess the development using Bayley Scales of Infant Development

arm_group.description: the low grade doctor who can do caesarean operation with no pregnant complications.
The middle grade doctor who can do caesarean operation with no or mild or middle pregnant complications.
the high doctor who can do all caesarean operation without limitations

intervention.description: Attending obstetrician can do the caesarean operation without pregnant complications.
Associate chief Obstetrician can do the caesarean operation without or mild or middle pregnant complications.
Chief obstetrician can do all caesarean operation without limitations.

study_pop.textblock: All neonates with gestational age are from 26 weeks to 42 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Gestational age (GA) is from 26 to 42 weeks
Exclusion Criteria:
- major congenital malformations or complex congenital heart disease

overall_official.affiliation: Daping Hospital and the Research Institute of Surgery of the Third Military Medical University

facility.name: Department of Pediatrics, Daping Hospital, Third Military Medical University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Daping Hospital and the Research Institute of Surgery of the Third Military Medical University
